channel.title: Having Trouble
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I wanted to try Moparscape out today, just make a local server and use console commands to achieve everything I never could in ordinary Runescape. :D I downloaded and installed the standard install package "MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan installer." I got it installed fine, ran the batch file, and was able to sucessfully create and play a local game. I encountered 2 major problems that I need help with:
1. I tried to enter the members world, but the gate wouldn't open. I used the noclip command to access it, and there were no NPCs or monsters! - How do I enable the members word, if possible?
2. Upon logging out and stopping the moparscape client, then logging back in later, my character's settings and items are gone! Isn't this supposed to be saved locally?
Thanks in advance.
EDIT: I now realize that all NPCs are nonexistent (except for shopkeepers) and that all gates, chests and other objects can not be interacted with... is this to be expected, or do I need to do something special to get it to work?

item.title: Having Trouble
item.dc:creator: @whiskey_pete whiskey pete
item.description:
@whiskey_pete wrote:

Hey Guys,
I wanted to try Moparscape out today, just make a local server and use console commands to achieve everything I never could in ordinary Runescape. I downloaded and installed the standard install package “MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan installer.” I got it installed fine, ran the batch file, and was able to sucessfully create and play a local game. I encountered 2 major problems that I need help with:

  1. I tried to enter the members world, but the gate wouldn’t open. I used the noclip command to access it, and there were no NPCs or monsters! - How do I enable the members word, if possible?

  2. Upon logging out and stopping the moparscape client, then logging back in later, my character’s settings and items are gone! Isn’t this supposed to be saved locally?

Thanks in advance.

EDIT: I now realize that all NPCs are nonexistent (except for shopkeepers) and that all gates, chests and other objects can not be interacted with… is this to be expected, or do I need to do something special to get it to work?
